meanings.definition: The quality or state of being reactive.
meanings.sent1: Her reactiveness to the loud noise startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The reactiveness of the chemicals caused a sudden explosion.
meanings.sent3: His extreme reactiveness to surprises always leads to funny reactions.
meanings.sent4: The reactiveness of the situation was like a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The reactiveness of the dog to the doorbell made it clear he was protective.

meanings.definition: The tendency to react or respond to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The reactiveness of the baby to music shows her love for melodies.
meanings.sent2: His reactiveness to criticism often leads to defensive responses.
meanings.sent3: The reactiveness of the cat to catnip always brings a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The reactiveness of the market to the news was swift and unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The reactiveness of the plant to sunlight is a beautiful sight to behold.
